ERROR_ADMIN_ONLY: Você deve ser um administrador para usar este comando.
ERROR_MISSING_PERMISSIONS: Você precisa da permissão {PERMISSIONS} para usar este comando.
ERROR_INVALID_COLOR: Invalid color. Use a preset or a valid HEX code.
ERROR_INVALID_CHANNEL: Você precisa fornecer um canal de {types} válido.
ERROR_ONLY_OG_USER_MAY_USE_BTN: Only the command's original user may use this component.
TITLE: Title

strings.TITLE: An unknown error occured.
strings.DESCRIPTION:
It was automatically reported to us. Here is what the error says:
{MESSAGE}

strings.TITLE: Pera lá!
strings.DESCRIPTION: You will be able to use this {TYPE} in {TIME}...

meta.description: Altere sua cor de destaque no CRBT.

options.name: cor
options.description: Choose a suggestion or a HEX code.

colorNames.sync: Sincronizar com a cor do perfil do Discord

errors.NO_DISCORD_COLOR: You couldn't find a profile color to sync. To set one, edit your Discord Profile.

strings.EMBED_SYNC_INFO: Your CRBT accent color is now synced to your Discord profile color.
strings.EMBED_DESCRIPTION: This color is used in CRBT's replies to you and in the display of your user information.

options.name: quando
options.description: Choose a date or relative time.

options.name: destino
options.description: A channel to send the reminder, in DMs by default.

errors.PAST: Reminders cannot be set in the past.
errors.INVALID_FORMAT: The time you entered is in an invalid format.
errors.TOO_LONG: Reminders cannot be set for more than 2 years in the future.

strings.SUCCESS_TITLE: Reminder set! Use {command} to manage your reminders.
strings.GCALENDAR_EVENT_CHANNEL: You will be also reminded in {destination}.

errors.CHOICE_EMPTY: A choice cannot be empty (excluding emoji).
errors.POLL_DATA_NOT_ALLOWED: Only chat moderators ("Manage Messages" permission) and the poll creator can use this menu.

strings.POLL_DESCRIPTION:
Ends {TIME}.
The creator may view vote data with the {ICON} button.
strings.SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: View votes, edit, delete or end your poll early with the {ICON} button.
strings.POLL_DATA_FOOTER: This data doesn't update live. Refresh it by using the button again.
strings.POLL_DESCRIPTION_ENDED: The poll has ended. You can no longer vote on it.
strings.POLL_RESULTS_DESCRIPTION_REST:
out of {TOTAL}!
Click the button below to view the full results.

USER_TYPE_COMMAND_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: A Discord user or user ID.
REASON_DESCRIPTION: More context for the Moderation History.

size.description: O tamanho do avatar a ser obtido.

format.description: O formato do avatar a ser obtido.

crbt_introduction.EMBED_DESCRIPTION:
{crbt} is now in {serverCount} servers!
To get started, use {help} for a brief list of commands. 
You can configure CRBT using the {settings} command.

errors.DMS_DISABLED: Enable your DMs or unblock CRBT in order to bookmark messages.

errors.ROLES_DO_NOT_EXIST: Um ou mais dos cargos selecionados foram removidos. Entre em contato com um administrador para resolver o problema.
errors.BUTTON_ROLES_ONCE: Você só pode selecionar este cargo uma vez, e você não pode removê-lo.

MODERATION_LOGS_VIEW_SELECT_MENU_PLACEHO: View, edit or delete an entry
JOINLEAVE_MESSAGE_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Edite esta mensagem para personalizar o {TYPE} usando o menu de seleção abaixo.
JOINLEAVE_MESSAGE_ERROR_MSG_EMPTY: Sua mensagem não pode estar vazia!
JOINLEAVE_PREVIEW_EMBED_DESCRIPTION: This is what the {TYPE} will look like when sent to {CHANNEL}.
ERROR_NO_MESSAGE: You must set a message first.
HELP_DESCRIPTION:
Type {prefix} click {botIcon} for a commands list, or right-click/long-press a message or user for quick actions.
CRBT has handy features such as reminders ({reminder}), Welcome/Farewell messages ({settings}), getting info ({infoCommands}), and more to come!
HELP_AD_DESCRIPTION: Consider adding it to your server!

winners.description: Quantas pessoas podem ganhar no sorteio.

QUESTION: Pergunta
8BALL_ANSWERS_POSITIVE: Do meu ponto de vista, sim.
8BALL_ANSWERS_NEGATIVE: Em geral, não me parece bom.
COMMENT_DESCRIPTION: A comment to display to provide additional context.

roll.name: roll
roll.description: Roll a dice. Supports RPG dice notation.

dice.name: dice
dice.description: What dice to roll. Use 'd6' for a 6-sided die.

ROLL_ERROR_TOO_MANY_DICE: You can't roll more than 100 dice at once.
REMINDER_LIST_NO_REMINDERS: No reminders set. Use {command} to set one!
SUBJECT: Assunto
DELETE_CONFIRMATION_TITLE: Do you want to delete it, forever?!

reminder_list.description: Get a list of your reminders.

values.name: values
values.description: The values to pick from, separated by commas.

privacy.name: privacy
privacy.description: Review and edit your privacy settings.

PRIVACY_SILENT_JOINS_DESCRIPTION: When on, CRBT won't announce when you join a server.
PRIVACY_SILENT_LEAVES_DESCRIPTION: When on, CRBT won't announce when you leave a server.
PRIVACY_TELEMETRY_DESCRIPTION: CRBT logs command usage according to our Privacy Policy. Disabling it stops sending logs.
PRIVACY_CRBT_DATA_DESCRIPTION: CRBT uses your input to provide features. You can download or delete your data, but deleting will erase all your data, including Reminders and Economy.
SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: Set up or edit CRBT's features with the select menu below.
SETTINGS_COLOR_DESCRIPTION:
Customize Polls, Giveaways, and more with themes! Auto Theming picks the primary color from your server's icon. Or, you can select a color preset or HEX code.
Currently set to **{color}**.
SETTINGS_MODLOGS_DESCRIPTION: Get realtime notifications in a chosen channel for all moderator actions taken using CRBT.
SETTINGS_MODREPORTS_DESCRIPTION: Members can report a message or user to a chosen channel using Moderation Reports by right-clicking or long-pressing them.
SETTINGS_ERROR_CHANNEL_NOT_FOUND: Channel not found. Edit it for CRBT to continue sending messages.
SETTINGS_ERROR_CONFIG_NOT_DONE: Feature not fully configured. Use the buttons below to finish setup.

anonymous.name: anonymous
anonymous.description: Search without sending a public messsage.

ERROR_MODULE_DISABLED_DESCRIPTION_REGULA: Ask a server administrator to enable it using {command}.
MODREPORTS_SUCCESS_TITLE: Your report was sent to {server}'s moderators.
MODREPORTS_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: It was added to {user}'s Moderation History. Review and action can be taken by those with access to the Moderation Reports channel.

role_info.description: Get information about a server role.

role.description: What role to get info from.

server_info.description: Get information about a Discord server.

SERVER_INFO_ERROR_INVALID_SERVER_TITLE: Invalid ID used or I'm not part of this server.
SERVER_INFO_ERROR_INVALID_SERVER_DESCRIP: You can **[invite me to it]({link})**, if you have permission to.
USER_BANNER_ERROR_NO_BANNER_SELF: You don't have a profile banner.
USER_BANNER_ERROR_NO_BANNER_OTHER: This user doesn't have a profile banner.

channel_info.description: Get information about a server channel.

emoji.description: Default and custom emoji are supported.

EMOJI_INFO_ERROR_UNKNOWN_DESCRIPTION: Use a default {standardEmoji} or custom {customEmoji} emoji instead.
INVITE_INFO_ERROR_INVALID_DESCRIPTION: Make sure it hasn't expired and that it is public.

invite_info.description: Get information about a Discord invite.

invite.description: A server or group DM invite link or code.

REPORT_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION:
It was sent to the **[Community server]({server})**, where members can discuss the issue.
You'll be updated about it through your DMs.
